```{r slam_hr_gluc_kable, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, echo=FALSE, eval=TRUE, include=TRUE}

table <- data.frame(replicate(5,sample(0:1,5,rep=TRUE)))


table2 <- kable(table, row.names = FALSE, col.names = c("Timepoint" , "Model 1", "Model 2", "Model 1", "Model 2"), escape = FALSE, align = "c", caption = "Mortality Hazard Ratios of Highest and Lowest Glucose Quartiles \n at Varying Timepoints Stratified by Sex") %>% 
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = "striped", full_width = F, position = "left", font_size = 12) %>% 
  column_spec(1, bold = TRUE, border_right = T) %>% 
  column_spec(3, border_right = T) %>% 
  column_spec(5, border_right = T) %>% 
  collapse_rows(columns = 1:2, valign = "middle") %>% 
  add_header_above(c(" " = 1, "All" = 2, "Female" = 2)) %>% 
  footnote(symbol = c(
    "symbol 1", 
    "symbol 2",
    "symbol 3", 
    "symbol 4", 
    "symbol 5", 
    "symbol 6", 
    "symbol 7"))

table2 

```
